headline: Wall Street Analysts See Schlumberger (SLB) as a Buy: Should You Invest?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Schlumberger (SLB) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

raw.headline: Wall Street Analysts See Schlumberger (SLB) as a Buy: Should You Invest?

headline: Core Laboratories Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Expenses Increase Y/Y
summary: CLB's second-quarter earnings beat estimates. However, it declined year over year due to the underperformance of the Reservoir Description segment.
